Class Model

java.lang.Object
Model
public class Model extends Object
Represents the model for the Connect Four game. This class contains the game logic and state, including the game board, current player, and methods for placing tokens, checking for winners, and resetting the board.

      Constructs a Model object. Initializes the game board and sets the current player to PLAYER1.

      public boolean placeToken(int col)
      Places a token in the specified column.
      Parameters:
      col - The column to place the token in
      Returns:
      True if the token was successfully placed, false otherwise

    • checkForWinner

      public boolean checkForWinner()
      Checks for a winner on the game board.
      Returns:
      True if there is a winner, false otherwise

    • isColumnFull

      public boolean isColumnFull()
      Checks if the game board is full.
      Returns:
      True if the board is full, false otherwise

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public int getCurrentPlayer()
      Gets the current player.
      Returns:
      The current player (PLAYER1 or PLAYER2)

    • getChipAt

      public int getChipAt(int row, int col)
      Gets the chip at the specified row and column on the game board.
      Parameters:
      row - The row index
      col - The column index
      Returns:
      The value of the chip at the specified position

    • resetBoard

      public void resetBoard()
      Resets the game board and sets the current player to PLAYER1.
